verses.verse: Hear,<WH8085> you children,<WH1121> the instruction<WH4148> of a father,<WH1> and attend<WH7181> to know<WH3045> understanding.<WH998>
For I give<WH5414> you good<WH2896> doctrine,<WH3948> forsake<WH5800> you not my law.<WH8451>
For I was my father's<WH1> son,<WH1121> tender and only<WH3173> beloved in the sight<WH6440> of my mother.<WH517>
He taught<WH3384> me also, and said<WH559> to me, Let your heart<WH3820> retain<WH8551> my words:<WH1697> keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and live.<WH2421>
Get<WH7069> wisdom,<WH2451> get<WH7069> understanding:<WH998> forget<WH7911> it not; neither<WH408> decline<WH5186> from the words<WH561> of my mouth.<WH6310>
Forsake<WH5800> her not, and she shall preserve<WH8104> you: love<WH157> her, and she shall keep<WH5341> you.
Wisdom<WH2451> is the principal<WH7225> thing; therefore get<WH7069> wisdom:<WH2451> and with all<WH3605> your getting<WH7069> get<WH7069> understanding.<WH998>
Exalt<WH5549> her, and she shall promote<WH7311> you: she shall bring<WH3513> you to honor,<WH3513> when<WH3588> you do embrace<WH2263> her.
She shall give<WH5414> to your head<WH7218> an ornament<WH3880> of grace:<WH2580> a crown<WH5850> of glory<WH8597> shall she deliver<WH4042> to you.
Hear,<WH8085> O my son,<WH1121> and receive<WH3947> my sayings;<WH561> and the years<WH8141> of your life<WH2416> shall be many.<WH7235>
I have taught<WH3384> you in the way<WH1870> of wisdom;<WH2451> I have led<WH1869> you in right<WH3476> paths.<WH4570>
When you go,<WH3212> your steps<WH6806> shall not be straitened;<WH3334> and when<WH518> you run,<WH7323> you shall not stumble.<WH3782>
Take<WH2388> fast hold<WH2388> of instruction;<WH4148> let her not go:<WH7503> keep<WH5341> her; for she is your life.<WH2416>
Enter<WH935> not into the path<WH734> of the wicked,<WH7563> and go<WH833> not in the way<WH1870> of evil<WH7451> men.
Avoid<WH6544> it, pass<WH5674> not by it, turn<WH7847> from it, and pass<WH5674> away.
For they sleep<WH3462> not, except<WH3808> they have done mischief;<WH7489> and their sleep<WH8142> is taken<WH1497> away,<WH1497> unless<WH518> <WH3808> they cause some to fall.<WH3782>
For they eat<WH3898> the bread<WH3899> of wickedness,<WH7562> and drink<WH8354> the wine<WH3196> of violence.<WH2555>
But the path<WH734> of the just<WH6662> is as the shining<WH5051> light,<WH216> that shines<WH215> more<WH1980> and more<WH1980> to the perfect<WH3559> day.<WH3117>
The way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> is as darkness:<WH653> they know<WH3045> not at what<WH4100> they stumble.<WH3782>
My son,<WH1121> attend<WH7181> to my words;<WH1697> incline<WH5186> your ear<WH241> to my sayings.<WH561>
Let them not depart<WH3868> from your eyes;<WH5869> keep<WH8104> them in the middle<WH8432> of your heart.<WH3824>
For they are life<WH2416> to those that find<WH4672> them, and health<WH4832> to all<WH3605> their flesh.<WH1320>
Keep<WH5341> your heart<WH3820> with all<WH3605> diligence;<WH4929> for out of it are the issues<WH8444> of life.<WH2416>
Put<WH5493> away<WH5493> from you a fraudulent<WH6143> mouth,<WH6310> and perverse<WH3891> lips<WH8193> put<WH7368> far<WH7368> from you.
Let your eyes<WH5869> look<WH5027> right<WH5227> on, and let your eyelids<WH6079> look straight<WH3474> before<WH5048> you.
Ponder<WH6424> the path<WH4570> of your feet,<WH7272> and let all<WH3605> your ways<WH1870> be established.<WH3559>
Turn<WH5186> not to the right<WH3225> hand<WH3227> nor to the left:<WH8040> remove<WH5493> your foot<WH7272> from evil.<WH7451>
